question: a boy is traveling from his house to school at 3 km / hr and reached school 9 minutes late . next day he traveled 4 km / hr and reached 6 minutes early . then find the distance between house and school ?
find the side of the largest possible square slabs which can be paved on the floor of a room 2 m 50 cm long and 1 m 50 cm broad . also find the number of such slabs to pave the floor .
what is the rate percent when the simple interest on rs . 1500 amount to rs . 250 in 5 years ?
a man sold 20 articles for $ 60 and gained 20 % . how many articles should he sell for $ 60 to incur a loss 20 % ?

the ratio by weight , measured in pounds , of books to clothes to electronics in a suitcase initially stands at 5 : 4 : 2 . someone removes 7 pounds of clothing from the suitcase , thereby doubling the ratio of books to clothes . how many pounds do the electronics in the suitcase weigh ?
how many odd 3 - digit integers greater than 800 are there such that all their digits are different ?
a car consumes 210 liters of petrol weekly . for how many days will 1470 liters of petrol be sufficient ?
the price of a book is increased from $ 300 to $ 480 . what is the % of increase in its price ?
what is the greatest 5 - digit number when divided by 6 , 7 , 8 , 9 , and 10 leaves a remainder of 4 , 5 , 6 , 7 , and 9 respectively ?
the average weight of a , b , c is 45 kg . the avg wgt of a & b be 40 kg & that of b , c be 43 kg . find the wgt of b .
what is the dividend from tony ' s stock , if he invested rs . 3200 at 85 to obtain an income of rs . 250 .
there are 500 employees in a room . 99 % are managers . how many managers must leave the room to bring down the percentage of managers to 98 % ?
a watch was sold at a loss of 46 % . if it was sold for rs . 140 more , there would have been a gain of 4 % . what is the cost price ?

in 1998 the profits of company n were 10 percent of revenues . in 1999 , the revenues of company n fell by 30 percent , but profits were 10 percent of revenues . the profits in 1999 were what percent of the profits in 1998 ?
the tax on a commodity is diminished by 10 % and its consumption increases by 10 % . find the effects on revenue ?
linda spent 3 / 4 of her savings on furniture and the rest on a tv . if the tv cost her $ 300 , what were her original savings ?
the length of a rectangular plot is 20 metres more than its breadth . if the cost of fencing the plot @ rs . 26.50 per metre is rs . 4240 , what is the length of the plot in metres ?
at what price must an book costing $ 47.50 be marked in order that after deducting 5 % from the list price . it may be sold at a profit of 25 % on the cost price ?
the speed of a train is 102 kmph . what is the distance covered by it in 30 minutes ?
total dinning bill for 7 people was $ 211.00 . if they add 15 % tip and divided the bill evenly , approximate . what was each persons find share

it takes 2 workers a total of 12 hours to build a giant machine with each worker working at the same rate . if 3 workers start to build the machine at 11 : 00 am , and one extra worker per hour is added beginning at 2 : 00 pm , at what time will the machine be complete ?
the lcm of two numbers is 2310 and hcf is 26 . if one of the numbers is 210 . then what is the other number ?
it takes 35 identical printing presses 12 hours to print 500,000 papers . how many hours would it take 30 of these printing presses to print 500,000 papers ?
anil had to do a multiplication . instead of taking 35 as one of the multipliers , he took 53 . as a result , the product went up by 540 . what is the new product ?
water consists of hydrogen and oxygen , and the approximate ratio , by mass , of hydrogen to oxygen is 2 : 16 . approximately how many grams of oxygen are there in 117 grams of water ?

jane and thomas are among the 7 people from which a committee of 4 people is to be selected . how many different possible committees of 4 people can be selected from these 7 people if at least one of either jane or thomas is to be selected ?
the ratio of the length and the width of a rectangle is 4 : 3 and the area of the rectangle is 6348 sq cm . what is the ratio of the width and the area of the rectangle ?

a hare and a jackal are running a race . 3 leaps of the hare are equal to 4 leaps of the jackal . for every 6 leaps of the hare , the jackal takes 7 leaps . find the ratio of the speed of the hare to the speed of the jackal .
a is half good a work man as b and together they finish a job in 12 days . in how many days working alone b finish the job ?

joe ’ s average ( arithmetic mean ) test score across 4 equally weighted tests was 90 . he was allowed to drop his lowest score . after doing so , his average test score improved to 95 . what is the lowest test score that was dropped ?

each week , harry is paid x dollars per hour for the first 30 hours and 1.5 x dollars for each additional hour worked that week . each week , annie is paid x dollars per hour for the first 40 hours and 2 x dollars for each additional hour worked that week . last week annie worked a total of 56 hours . if harry and annie were paid the same amount last week , how many hours did harry work last week ?
if two dice are thrown together , the probability of getting an even number on one die and an odd number on the other is - .
a train running at the speed of 52 km / hr crosses a pole in 9 seconds . find the length of the train ?

two pipes can fill a tank in 10 minutes and 25 minutes . an outlet pipe can empty the tank in 45 minutes . if all the pipes are opened when the tank is empty , then how many minutes will it take to fill the tank ?
in a 280 meters race a beats b by 56 m or 7 seconds . a ' s time over the course is :

three pipes a , b and c can fill a tank from empty to full in 30 minutes , 20 minutes and 10 minutes respectively . when the tank is empty , all the three pipes are opened . a , b and c discharge chemical solutions p , q and r respectively . what is the proportion of solution q in the liquid in the tank after 3 minutes ?
a person borrows rs . 9000 for 2 years at 4 % p . a . simple interest . he immediately lends it to another person at 6 p . a for 2 years . find his gain in the transaction per year .
what is the cost of leveling the field in the form of parallelogram at the rate of rs . 70 / 10 sq . metre , whose base & perpendicular distance from the other side being 84 m & 24 m respectively ?

the first year , two cows produced 8100 litres of milk . the second year their production increased by 15 % and 10 % respectively , and the total amount of milk increased to 9100 litres a year . how many litres were milked from one cow ?

a tank can supply water to a village for 20 days . if a leak at the bottom of the tank drains out 10 liters per day , the supply lasts for 15 days only . for how many days will the supply last if the leak drains out 20 liters per day ?
| x + 3 | – | 4 - x | = | 7 + x | how many solutions will this equation have ?

without stoppages , a train travels certain distance with an average speed of 80 km / h , and with stoppages , it covers the same distance with an average speed of 60 km / h . how many minutes per hour the train stops ?
what is the smallest positive integer x such that 80 - x is the cube of a positive integer
the length of rectangle is thrice its breadth and its perimeter is 80 m , find the area of the rectangle ?
find avrg speed if a man travels at speed of 32 km / hr up and 48 km / hr dawn at an altitude of 230 m .
8 k 8 + k 88 - - - - - - - - 16 t 6 if k and t represent non - zero digits within the integers above , what is t ?
the perimeter of a triangle is 40 cm and the in radius of the triangle is 2.5 cm . what is the area of the triangle ?

without stoppages , a train travels certain distance with an average speed of 400 km / h , and with stoppages , it covers the same distance with an average speed of 360 km / h . how many minutes per hour the train stops ?
the least whole number which when subtracted from both the terms of the ratio 6 : 7 to give a ratio less than 16 : 21 , is ?
a car takes 6 hours to cover a distance of 630 km . how much should the speed in kmph be maintained to cover the same direction in 3 / 2 th of the previous time ?
